basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello! I'm Keshav Kalia, a current student at the University of Washington, where I study informatics and expect to graduate in 2026. Currently, I work as a Junior Software Engineer at Mapsimum Mobile, a dynamic startup. In my free time, I enjoy working out and playing basketball. I'm passionate about combining my technical skills with my love for fitness and sports, always striving for a healthy balance between work and play. Feel free to explore my portfolio to see the projects I've been working on and learn more about my journey.

projects.title: AI Flashcards
projects.description: A gym rats best friend! Wondering what the macros are looking like for you meal? Look no further as this calculator will let you know! Need a recipe with foods you have? Need Advice from an AI? This is the Calculator for you. Project made at a hackathon.

projects.title: Flask Notes Web App
projects.description: Developed a dynamic web application using Flask, following an in-depth tutorial. The application enables users to create, edit, and delete notes, offering a seamless experience for managing personal notes.
